name: Cubes In Danger 3 (GamesByrd) (GamesByrd)
description:
New levels! New cubes! More fun!

Welcome to the exciting platform video game where you and your friend can take on the challenge of navigating through the board that never stops, and is filled with obstacles and treasures! You must work together to collect coins and avoid spikes while searching for two keys that will unlock the portal to the next level. With smooth and intuitive controls, you'll need quick reflexes and teamwork to conquer each level. Get ready to embark on an adventure full of fun and excitement with this 2-player platform game!
